channel.title: A Memory of a Dream - VJM (multi-genre/future 80s)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/v_m_1234/sets/a-memory-or-a-dream
Please let me know what you think of my newest album!
SOON coming out with a deluxe version with two bonus tracks, only on Spotify.
Also HUGE thanks to @DJ_La_Rocca and @Mr_Mooo for the super encouraging feedback!!
